item.title: hxp CTF 2021: reasonable
item.description: reasonable is a reverse challenge from hxp CTF 2021. Although it is said to be of medium difficulty, this is the only challenge that has zero solves after the CTF ends. Challenge Summary TODO We are given two files, flag.hpp and reasonable.cpp. flag.hpp: using 🐋 = 🔭< 🧘< 🧵<🛫<🦚<4.18970_👺>, 🦚<85.58454_👺>, 🦚<70.21769_👺>>, 🛫<1.65858_👺, 3.60281_👺, 0.96354_👺>, 🛫<0.92891_👺, 🦚<0.00941_👺>, 🦚<2.48813_👺>>, 🛫<1.10475_👺, 4.09722_👺, 0.39722_👺>, 🥠>, // ... 😁<🛫<50.73104_👺, 126.49901_👺, 🦚<153.14259_👺>>, 🛫<49.52199_👺, 108.10803_👺, 🦚<143.
